Andy Tran | github.io

Hello and welcome. Thanks for checking out my Github page. Here you can see the projects I've completed. Feel free to get in touch if you'd like, and I hope you enjoy what I've made!

Peeple

Phonebook app built in Sinatra using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery and PostgreSQL. (learning assignment)

Claira

Time capsule-esque app that allows users to send media-rich letters to themselves in the future. (mid-term project)

Fresh Papaya

Movie aggregator site built in Ruby on Rails. (learning assignment)
